name: Hexit - A minimal puzzle game
description:
Simply create groups of hexagons in this sleek, mind-bending puzzle game.

- Easy to learn, surprising puzzling depth.
- Play through dozens of highly diverse, meticulously-crafted levels.
- Challenge your Facebook friends and beat their scores.
- Journey through the Tribal Jungle, past the Sea Voyage and into the Deep Sea.
- Experience beautiful, minimal design and delightful sound effects.
- Play on phone or tablet, with your progress synchronized.

Download now!
